title: Is It My Fault?
body: So I log in one day to find a free chest I open and recieve 3 things which was cool... And decided to buy 10 chests the bundle and felt cheated when i only got one thing from each chest was there something i missed?

replies.body:
Hey there,

The chest you received for free was probably the new replacement "starter chest" introduced with hextech crafting to replace the free RP players used to receive.

Normal hextech chests will mostly only give you one item from each chest (Some will contain essence along with an item) and that's about it.
